hero.title:
Diverse Desktop Schedule
A new desktop form defined by us

footer.desc: Bring a new personalized experience to your desktop, supporting Windows, macOS, and Linux systems.
footer.cr: Based on GPL v3 protocol release.

desktop.title: Say hello to the course schedule of the future form

personalization.title:
Plugins & Themes
Ultimate Customization
personalization.content: In Class Widgets, a Python-based plugin system and plugin marketplace are provided; you can install the plugins you need from the plugin marketplace. And a theme system that shows individuality, allowing you to build a unique Class Widgets.

compatibility.title:
Near-perfect
Compatibility
compatibility.content: Class Widgets is built on PyQt and provides support for the three major operating systems: Windows, Linux, and MacOS.

notification.title: Powerful Notification System
notification.content: Provides a powerful notification system that can send reminders at times such as before and after class; in addition, plugins can also call the notification interface to make it more practical.

floating.title: A New Way to Hide
floating.content: The new hiding method - floating window, can condense the important information of Class Widgets into a floating window, which is lighter and more convenient. Minimize its interference with teaching work as much as possible.

design.title: Ultimate Design Language
design.content: Class Widgets uses the Fluent Design language launched by Microsoft to make the interface more concise, comfortable and smooth, and uses the QFluentWidgets UI library.

download.title: Download Class Widgets
download.description: Download the Class Widgets application to use on your device. We provide versions for macOS, Windows, and Linux to ensure you can enjoy our software on any platform.
download.use_proxy: Use proxy to download (please check this option if the direct download speed is slow)

macos.title: Download for macOS
macos.description: Supports Apple Silicon and Intel processors.

windows.title: Download for Windows
windows.description:
Supports Windows 7 and above.
Provides x64 and x86 versions.

linux.title: Download for Linux
linux.description: Currently only supports Debian, please stay tuned for other versions.

footer.help: Need help? Go to our Github or join the Community
footer.security: All downloads are digitally signed and security verified
